description: Plugin registry for Treeline. Submit a PR to add your plugin!

plugins.name: Budget
plugins.description: Track spending against tag-based budget categories with rollovers.
plugins.author: Treeline

plugins.name: Emergency Fund
plugins.description: See how long your emergency fund would last based on your actual spending patterns.
plugins.author: Treeline

plugins.name: Savings Goals
plugins.description: Set savings targets and track your progress toward each goal.
plugins.author: Treeline

plugins.name: Subscriptions
plugins.description: Automatically detects recurring charges from your transaction history.
plugins.author: Treeline

plugins.name: Cash Flow
plugins.description: Plan ahead by scheduling expected income and expenses.
plugins.author: Treeline
